mapper.select: select g_idx, g_email, g_name, g_photo, g_phone, g_url, g_profile, g_level, g_point from guest where g_idx=#{g_idx}

SELECT ho_idx, d_idx, g_idx, o_idx, d_img1, o_state, DATE_FORMAT(o_orderdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as o_orderdate, o_payment, DATE_FORMAT(o_ckin, '%Y/%m/%d') as o_ckin, DATE_FORMAT(o_ckout, '%Y/%m/%d') as o_ckout, o_finalprice, DATE_FORMAT(o_refunddate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as o_refunddate FROM hotel_detail d, orders o, guest g, hotel h WHERE d.d_idx = o.o_didx AND g.g_idx = o_gidx AND d.d_ho_idx = h.ho_idx and g_idx=#{g_idx} order BY o_orderdate desc
SELECT COUNT(gc_idx) AS c_count FROM coupon c,g_coupon gc WHERE c.c_num=gc.gc_num and gc_check=0 AND gc_gidx=#{g_idx}
SELECT d_idx,ho_img,ho_name,d_price FROM hotel h, hotel_detail d WHERE h.ho_idx = d.d_ho_idx AND d_idx = #{d_idx}

SELECT g_idx, h_idx, d_idx, ho_idx, rv_idx, ho_name, d_img1, h_profile, h_name, DATE_FORMAT(rv_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as rv_date, rv_content FROM guest g, host h, review rv, hotel_detail hd, hotel ho WHERE g.g_email = rv.rv_writer AND rv.rv_hd_idx = hd.d_idx AND hd.d_ho_idx = ho.ho_idx AND ho.ho_h_idx = h.h_idx AND g_idx=#{gidx} AND rv_deleted=0 order by rv_date desc

SELECT g_idx, h_idx, h_profile, h_name, DATE_FORMAT(rp_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as rp_date, rp_content FROM guest g, host h, reply rp, review rv, hotel_detail hd, hotel ho WHERE g.g_email = rv.rv_writer AND rp.rp_rv_idx = rv.rv_idx AND rv.rv_hd_idx = hd.d_idx AND hd.d_ho_idx = ho.ho_idx AND ho.ho_h_idx = h.h_idx AND g_idx=#{gidx} AND rp_deleted = 0 order by rp_date desc
SELECT COUNT(*) as reviewcount FROM review WHERE rv_writer=(SELECT g_email from guest where g_idx=#{gidx}) AND rv_deleted = 0

SELECT ho_idx, d_idx, g_idx, o_idx, o_ckin, o_ckout, o_adult, o_child, o_baby, o_price, o_discount, o_benefit, o_finalprice, o_payment, o_orderdate, ifnull(o_refunddate,0) as o_refunddate, paymentId, ho_name, ho_img, d_room_type, d_beds, h_name, g_name FROM hotel ho, hotel_detail d, host h, guest g, orders o WHERE o.o_didx = d.d_idx AND o.o_gidx = g.g_idx AND d.d_ho_idx = ho.ho_idx AND ho.ho_h_idx = h.h_idx AND g_idx = #{gidx} AND d_idx = #{didx} AND ho_idx=#{hoidx} AND o_idx=#{oidx}
